name: Join Box
description:
Join the boxes
Did you learn physics in school? Then try your hand at this awesome game! A little gravity, a little rubbing and you're done! Sounds easy, doesn't it? Well, let's see you.

Why do you have to join these 2 boxes?
The first reason is "just for fun", and it's completely true. Why not? Everyone deserves to relax after the a hectic pace of a work day, and this game knows how to help with that! Simple actions, а fresh and cool design, a wide variety of tasks - this game has hundreds of levels so you can have lots of fun in your spare time.

The second reason is for strategy. The application has a difficult puzzle in which you have to think carefully to overcome the level: find the best way to join the 2 boxes. Watch out for the center of gravity, which often misleads you.

What's the point?
Now we come to the third reason. The game is well organized in terms of plot. This means that while playing, you will be captivated by maximum concentration.
In short, destroying boxes is a good way to relax after a long day and improve your logical thinking at the same time. Press the button and download!
